A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Cinematically I thought it was good\, almost great. Unfortunately it's ESB in reverse with a bit of throne room ROTJ for good measure. 

Also Disney has continued its efforts to destroy everything that made the core Star Wars what it was\, the Skywalkers. Killing Luke ruined the movie for me. I didn't think I could be more let down after killing Han off.

The last three movies shouldn't have been to introduce a new generation. Side stories could have done that. These should have been Luke ending the order and returning the republic to the galaxy.
